Class Description
Animator
A class used to abstract animations
Attackable  
Attacker  
DamageParticle
A class used to display damage particles
Debugger
Class to allow for easier debugging of various aspects of the game
DigitParticle
A class used to display digit particles
DungeonMan
The main class of the game
DungeonMan.State  
Enemy
An abstract class defining an Enemy
EnemyAnimation
A class used to abstract EnemyAnimation
Entity
An abstract class defining an Entity
EntityManager
A class used for managing entities
Gold
A class creating and animating gold
HealParticle
A class used to display heal particles.
HealthBar
A class for creating a healthbar and adding it to the UI
InputManager
Class to abstract away taking input.
ItemHealthRestore
A class representing health restoration items in the shop
ItemReroll
A class representing health restoration items in the shop
MeleeEnemy
Class defining methods of a melee enemy
Moveable  
Particle
A class used to abstract creation of a particle
ParticleManager
A class used to manage particles
ParticleUtility  
Player
A class defining the Player
PlayerAnimation
A class managing player animations
Projectile
A class defining a Projectile
RangedEnemy
A class defining a ranged enemy
RangedSlime
Creates a ranged slime
Room
Deals with changing rooms and spawning new enemies.
ShopItem
An abstract class defining a shop item
ShopManager
A Class used for managing the shop
ShopStock  
Slime
Class defining a Slime
UI
A class creating the UI for the player
Utilities  
Weapon
Weapon class, represents weapons.
WeaponGenerator
A class used to generate weapons randomly
